alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 07 at 11:56AM CST until January 09 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central, southeast, and southwest Mississippi, including the following areas, in south central Mississippi, Jefferson Davis, Lawrence, Lincoln and Marion. In southeast Mississippi, Covington, Forrest, Jones and Lamar. In southwest Mississippi, Franklin MS. * WHEN...Monday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Three to six inches of rain with locally higher amounts may fall in a short period of time as thunderstorms move repeatedly across the area Monday night. This would likely lead to flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
